attributes.action: Teach The Young People Electronics In All Primary and Secondary Schools.
attributes.additional_details: Please visit the site for more details and choose YES or NO www.livepages1.com/survey.htm
attributes.background:
As technology changes employers are looking for young people with skills that meets the 21st century.

A growing number of public and Local Government Councillors want the HM Government to invest more money in introducing and teaching the children basic Electronic engineering.
